# Angular v21 Coordinate Converter Project

This project is an Angular v21 application for coordinate conversion between Decimal Degrees (DD), Degrees Minutes Seconds (DMS), and Degrees Decimal Minutes (DDM) formats.

## Project Structure
- Uses Angular v21 with standalone components
- Implements Angular Signals for reactive forms
- Professional coordinate conversion algorithms
- Responsive design with modern UI

## Development Guidelines
- Use signals for state management
- Follow Angular v21 best practices
- Maintain TypeScript strict mode
- Ensure mobile responsiveness

## Component Architecture
- Standalone components with minimal dependencies
- Signal-based reactive forms
- Real-time coordinate conversion
- Input validation and error handling
